content: star from disney s wish pattern by megan kreiner of mk crochet & knits sweet little star is full of hopes dreams and a love for snuggly crochet gifts with a little imagination and a skein of magical yarn star is ready to whip up anything you could wish for in yarn form now you can stitch up your very own star complete with their favorite heart pattern designed by disney animator megan kreiner copyright©2023disneyenterprises incandmkcrochet&knits allrightsreserved nopartofthispatternmaybereproducedortransmittedinanyformwithoutwritten permissionfromthecopyrightholders imadeawishonastar…andthestaranswered -asha whatareyou five -gabo suggested yarns youwillneed1skein orless ofeachcolor berrocoworstedyarn 3 5oz|100g 210yds|193m a goldenrod #9743 c pumpkin #9724 b buttercup #9712 d wild cherry #9755 notions hooks materials size f 3 75 mm hook 1 bag of fiberfill scissors tapestry needle and/or doll needle optional dark orange felt with sewing needle and thread or craft glue abbreviations ar - magic_ring *fslp s - front side loop s skip - skip beg - beginning rem - remaining slip_stitch s - slip_stitch es *brlp s - back ridge repeat - repeat space s - space s loop s round s - round s st s - stitch es chain s - chain s single_crochet - single_crochet decrease - together chain-space - chain space decrease - single_crochet 2 yo - yarn over cont - continue together *brlps and fslps refer to the loop s on the front and back sides of a chain copyright©2023disneyenterprises incandmkcrochet&knits allrightsreserved nopartofthispatternmaybereproducedortransmittedinanyformwithoutwritten permissionfromthecopyrightholders pattern body with a and size f 3 75mm hook make a 5-st ar round 1 single_crochet 2 in each st around 10 round 2 single_crochet 1 single_crochet 2 in next st 5 times 15 round 3 single_crochet 1 single_crochet 2 in next st single_crochet 1 5 times 20 round 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet 2 in next st single_crochet 1 5 times 25 round 5 single_crochet 1 single_crochet 2 in next st single_crochet 3 5 times 30 round 6 single_crochet 2 single_crochet 2 in next st single_crochet 3 5 times 35 round 7 single_crochet 5 single_crochet 2 in next st single_crochet 1 5 times 40 round 8 single_crochet 3 single_crochet 2 in next st single_crochet 4 5 times 45 round 9 single_crochet 6 single_crochet 2 in next st single_crochet 2 5 times 50 round 10 single_crochet 3 single_crochet 2 in next st single_crochet 6 5 times 55 round 11 single_crochet 5 single_crochet 2 in next st single_crochet 5 5 times 60 rnds 12-13 single_crochet 60 round 14 single_crochet 2 chain-8 skip chain-8 skip 8 single_crochet 6 chain-8 skip chain-8 skip 8 single_crochet 4 chain-7 skip chain-7 skip 7 single_crochet 2 chain-7 skip chain-7 skip 7 single_crochet 4 chain-8 skip chain-8 skip 8 single_crochet 4 60 note countchsassts round 15 single_crochet 60 working in brlps of chs when needed round 16 single_crochet 60 round 17 single_crochet 5 decrease single_crochet 5 5 times 55 round 18 single_crochet 3 decrease single_crochet 6 5 times 50 round 19 single_crochet 6 decrease single_crochet 2 5 times 45 round 20 single_crochet 3 decrease single_crochet 4 5 times 40 round 21
